LanguageData.Building_NR_AutoMachineTool_TierOne.desc: Place the AutoMachineTool facing the work table. Set the output destination of the finished product. The AutoMachineTool executes a requested craft that can be created with the material in the surrounding squares from the work table creation request. By default, Tier 1 is Skill Level 5, Tier 2 is Skill Level 10, and Tier 3 is Skill Level 20.(Skill level can be changed by MOD setting)
